appetizers.name: Ragda Patties
appetizers.description: Potato tikies topped with dried peas cooked with onions, tomatoes, ginger and garlic, finished with tamarind and mint chutneys.

appetizers.name: Shrimp Kurkuri
appetizers.description: Shrimps marinated in a light batter, flavored with curry leaves, dipped in coconut powder and golden fried.

entrees.name: Mix Vegetable Vindaloo
entrees.description: Blend of vegetables cooked in a spicy curry sauce with a touch of vinegar.

entrees.name: Chicken Banjara
entrees.description: Curry chicken cubes cooked with mashed eggplant in a traditional brown curry sauce.

entrees.name: Gobi Gosht
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cooked with cauliflower in a curry sauce.

entrees.name: Fish Madras
entrees.description: Tilapia fillets tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves, cooked in a coconut flavored sauce.

entrees.name: Tandoori Salmon Tikka
entrees.description: Fresh Chilean salmon fillets lightly marinated and cooked to perfection in the tandoor oven.
